0.content: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah

1.content: Verily, along with every hardship is relief

2.content: Allah intends to make things easy on you. And man has been created weak.

3.content: So be patient (O Muhammad SAW). Verily, the Promise of Allâh is true, and let not those who have no certainty of faith, discourage you from conveying Allâh's Message (which you are obliged to convey
